snippet: A federal appeals court said it agreed with a 2013 decision that Apple conspired with publishers to raise prices for e-books.
abstract: Federal appeals court upholds 2013 district court ruling that found Apple was head of industrywide conspiracy among book publishers to raise prices of digital books.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court said it agreed with a 2013 decision that Apple conspired with publishers to raise prices for e-books.

headline.main: Ruling That Apple Led E-Book Pricing Conspiracy Is Upheld
headline.print_headline: Ruling That Apple Led Price-Fixing Is Upheld
